author: JIM GOMEZ and JOEAL CALUPITAN
title: 50 years apart: Philippine activist fights dictator then son
description: MANILA, Philippines (AP) — Memories of the “People Power” revolt by millions of Filipinos who helped overthrow Philippine dictator Ferdinand Marcos 36 years ago are bittersweet for Loretta Rosales, who opposed him as an activist and was arrested and tortured …
